examples: Rick hasn't changed. He looks exactly the same as he did at school.
Rick no ha cambiado. Se ve exactamente igual que en la escuela.
We examined changing attitudes towards education.
Examinamos el cambio de actitudes hacia la educación.
The company failed to adapt to changing circumstances.
La empresa no se adaptó a las circunstancias cambiantes.
Things have changed dramatically since then.
Las cosas han cambiado drásticamente desde entonces.
